example.name: all exx in wsj are like this
example.text: The six wines of the Domaine de la Romanee-Conti, 72 of the most precious acres of vineyard anywhere in the world, have commanded three-digit price tags for several years now.
example.arg: The six wines of the Domaine de la Romanee-Conti, 72 of the most precious acres of vineyard anywhere in the world,

roleset.name: impelled action
roleset.note: COMMAND-V NOTES: Member of VNcls order-60-1. (from command.02-v)

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: Now we are all here before God to hear everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us . ''

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1
example.text: I am happy that they are following the way of truth , just as the Father commanded us .
